thread.section_title: Hotel Le A - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 6 Nations Stay
thread.title_full: 6 Nations Stay - Review of Hotel Le A, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: spirie555
title: 6 Nations Stay
text: Fabulous location, very friendly, lovely touch of being welcomed by the owner and shown to our room. All staff were exceptionally friendly & helpful, especially the staff on at night time. Room was perfect, 401 - superior, nice size and very clean & modern. Would definitely recommend!! Great location not far off the Champs Elysees. Thanks for making our stay a lovely one, despite the rugby result
